item.description:
Let's rally our Meetup troops to show Dr. Paul a warm and supportive welcome to the GOP Straw Poll. Let's take this opportunity to show our enthusiasm and strength in numbers to the the other GOP attendees.

An hour prior to the GOP BBQ, we will meet to line Elm Street with Ron Paul supporters holding campaign signs and revolution banners. This rally will take place just a couple of blocks away from the GOP event.

After the banner wave, we will head over to the GOP event to cast our votes for Ron Paul.

We meet at the Verizon Center at 11:00 AM and spread out from there.
555 Elm Street, Manchester, NH 03101

Don't worry if you don't have signs or banners. The Nashua Ron Paul Meetup Group will supply 35, 3 x 9 foot banners that we've made for this purpose. We have more events planned with these banners, so be sure to return them after the event.
item.name: Revolutionize Elm Street
